shapes

Class ShapeContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.ShapeContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable

    public class ShapeContainer
extends Object
implements Iterable
    ShapeContainer class contains various shapes and allows to make certain operations
    Version:
    1.0 22.03.17
    Author:
    Bartu Atabek

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Shape s)
      add method to add a shape into shape container which also updates the total area
      Shape contains(int x, int y)
      finds the shape with the given point
      double getArea()
      get area method calculates and returns the total area of the shapes that are in the container
      Iterator<Shape> iterator()
      creates an instance of BalloonIterator
      void removeSelected()
      removes all the selected shapes from the container
      int selectAllAt(int x, int y)
      returns the number of shapes found at the point x,y and sets the selected property of those shapes to true
      int size()
      gets the number of shapes in the container
      String toString()
      to string method for the shapes
